summary.para: The DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE enumeration specifies that the information that is contained within the structure is either source or target mode.
Indicates that the structure contains source mode information.
Indicates that the structure contains target mode information.
Indicates that the structure contains a valid structure. Supported starting in Windows 10.
Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
